1.name: a jail cell
1.description:
a small room with a metal bed in one corner.
You said 'No jail can hold me'
You notice a jailkey sitting on your bed

bed.description: Hard looks cold. Has a jailkey sitting on top of it

north.lockedMsg: You need a key to open this door
north.unlockMsg: You reach around the door and use the jail key
breaks: The key gets stuck in the door rending it useless

2.name: a hallway
2.description: a big long room with a sword on a table in the corner

table.description: A small wooden table in the corner of the hallway. Has a sword on top of it.

3.name: a jail cell
3.description: a small room with a metal bed in one corner.

bed.description: Hard looks cold. Has bones on the top of it.

4.name: a jail cell
4.description: a small room with a metal bed in one corner.

5.name: a hallway
5.description: a smaller room with a rat in the middle of it

6.name: a hallway
6.description: a smaller room with a goon blocking the exit

says.start: Do you want me to move?

yes.start: Ok I'll move. Oh and take this.

no.start:
You stare at each other for a prolonged period of time. Longer than any two people should stare at each other. But you feel a sense of uprising as you stare at him. He stares at you back. Unblinking.
'You sure you don't want me to move?' he says

yes.start: Ok I'll move. Oh and take this.

no.start: You continue to stare at each other untill the end of time. The game ends.

north.lockedMsg: You need a key to open this door
north.unlockMsg: You use the key to open the door
